author: MemeLordJerry
title: Could be louder
review:
Picked this item up at Ross, a discount store in the US.  It was this or the two Chima clocks, and I liked this one best, as it glows in the dark and black light.

Box/Instructions

Regular clock-setting instructions only.

Parts

One part, and it does not come apart.

Minifigures

One maxi-sized figure.

The build

just insert batteries LOL

The completed model

Tells time well, but the alarm does little to wake a 22-yr old girl child to make her go to work on time.

Overall opinion

If I can find the Vampire for cheap, I'll pick it up too, and maybe the both of them can get this kid to go to work on time.
